page.shortlink: api reporting namespace report excel template class
page.description: All the data pertaining to formatting Excel output for the data generation object.

property.name: styleSheet
property.description: Type "C". Stylesheet to use for generated excel spreadsheet.

property.name: Column
property.description: Type "Array of ReportExcelColumn". Column definitions for generated excel spreadsheet.

property.name: Band
property.description: Type "Array of ReportExcelBand". Band definitions for generated excel spreadsheet.

property.name: DisplayGridLines
property.description: Type "L". Turn on show for grid lines.

property.name: repeatRowCount
property.description: Type "N". Number of rows to lock at the top of the generated excel spreadsheet.

property.name: repeatColumnStart
property.description: Type "N". Which column to start repeat in generated Excel spreadsheet.

property.name: repeatColumnCount
property.description: Type "N". How many columns to repeat in generated excel spreadsheet.
